package.name: cadence_fbpixel
package.summary: This extension allows you to quickly implement Facebook tracking and conversion code on your Magento store. Supports Visitor, Purchase, AddToCart, AddToWishlist, ViewProduct, Search, & Initiate Checkout Events
package.description:
This Facebook Conversion Code extension allows you to quickly implement events using the new Facebook Pixel. Learn how it works..

Click here to view the official Facebook Tracking & Conversion Code User Guide with detailed step-by-step instructions.

Tracks Currency & Grand Total

This extension supports stores with multiple currencies, and supports Visitor, Purchase, AddToCart, AddToWishlist, ViewProduct, Search, & Initiate Checkout Events.

About The Developer

Cadence Labs is a digital marketing, design, and Magento agency based in Boulder, Colorado. Our developers are Magento certified eCommerce geeks!
package.notes:
Tested on CE 1.9.x; Added Events: - AddToWishlist - AddToCart - InitiateCheckout - ViewContent (Product) - Search
